features.title: Configure Air-Gapped Admin
features.description: Set up admin-web as a fully functional, standalone, local-only application with direct database access using service role keys, independent authentication, and complete admin functionality.

source_evidence.quote: Admin website is an air-gapped, locally executed only website

features.title: Remove Admin from Main Site
features.description: Completely eliminate all admin functionality from the public-facing website including pages, API routes, components, middleware protection, and UI elements.

source_evidence.quote: remove all admin functionality from the main website and move it to the admin website

features.title: Security Hardening
features.description: Implement deployment prevention, verify complete separation, ensure database security with RLS enforcement, and create comprehensive documentation for the air-gapped architecture.
